f23d5b4692f9a40803e53a8156b72b4c1f9902a88cd65ba964db103dab9","dweb:/ipfs/QmPKn6EYDgpga7KtpkA8wV2yJCYGMtc9K4LkJfhKX2RVSV"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/interfaces/draft-IERC1822.sol":{"keccak256":"0x2a1f9944df2015c081d89cd41ba22ffaf10aa6285969f0dc612b235cc448999c","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://ef381843676aec64421200ee85eaa0b1356a35f28b9fc67e746a6bbb832077d9","dweb:/ipfs/QmY8aorMYA2TeTCnu6ejDjzb4rW4t7TCtW4GZ6LoxTFm7v"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/proxy/ERC1967/ERC1967Utils.sol":{"keccak256":"0x06a78f9b3ee3e6d0eb4e4cd635ba49960bea34cac1db8c0a27c75f2319f1fd65","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://547d21aa17f4f3f1a1a7edf7167beff8dd9496a0348d5588f15cc8a4b29d052a","dweb:/ipfs/QmT16JtRQSWNpLo9W23jr6CzaMuTAcQcjJJcdRd8HLJ6cE"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/proxy/beacon/IBeacon.sol":{"keccak256":"0xc59a78b07b44b2cf2e8ab4175fca91e8eca1eee2df7357b8d2a8833e5ea1f64c","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://5aa4f07e65444784c29cd7bfcc2341b34381e4e5b5da9f0c5bd00d7f430e66fa","dweb:/ipfs/QmWRMh4Q9DpaU9GvsiXmDdoNYMyyece9if7hnfLz7uqzWM"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/Address.sol":{"keccak256":"0xaf28a975a78550e45f65e559a3ad6a5ad43b9b8a37366999abd1b7084eb70721","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://b7bd24e224f67f65bfadf85dc2929fa965456bb2415478bd0125471b5ce35245","dweb:/ipfs/QmRaydGr8BTHs1kvaZfsNU69pKzUAGFrvABn1KiRSbE51y"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/StorageSlot.sol":{"keccak256":"0x32ba59b4b7299237c8ba56319110989d7978a039faf754793064e967e5894418","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://1ae50c8b562427df610cc4540c9bf104acca7ef8e2dcae567ae7e52272281e9c","dweb:/ipfs/QmTHiadFCSJUPpRjNegc5SahmeU8bAoY8i9Aq6tVscbcKR"]},"src/Market/IMarket.sol":{"keccak256":"0x854e78e83e356140d84855b892aa38feb615939aa60c34c55c3711e021bc6387","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://e6822c01ce4246d18fae79ccb6533068cb22d3d7333db69ce5250894df42df3e","dweb:/ipfs/Qmd6jD41wjyBDvbVJ2RHokcqPsoAV5XTkVwuRS3zGWt4Ms"]},"src/Market/Market.sol":{"keccak256":"0x644fdf580200a9eaba8c3c7a54fdeda25bf68ce3f664824fe7440bf465a538a9","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://adc566411921688396139163a11386d355b3e964a4cd05d4eead7788eb731e63","dweb:/ipfs/QmTbeKahXTGjrCj4wTxELuKrszDLpYsXuSdyxBZdt1HQEb"]}},"version":1}

advanceEpoch(bytes32).details: Only MarketController can advance epochsFor time-based markets (epochDuration > 0), this function does nothing

createMarket(bytes32,uint256,uint256,uin.details: Only MarketController can create marketsIf epochDuration > 0, market uses time-based automatic epoch rollingIf epochDuration = 0, market uses manual epoch advancement (legacy behavior)

params._epochDuration: Duration of each epoch in seconds (0 for manual epoch advancement)
params._outcomeCount: Number of possible outcomes for this market
params._resolutionTime: Timestamp when market should resolve (0 for manual resolution)

getConditionId(address,bytes32,uint256,u.details: Centralizes condition ID generation logic in market metadata layer

getCurrentEpoch(bytes32).details: For time-based markets (epochDuration > 0), calculates current epoch from time elapsedFor manual markets (epochDuration = 0), returns stored epoch value

returns._0: Epoch duration in seconds (0 if manual epochs)
Timestamp when the epoch ends (0 if manual epochs)
Timestamp when the epoch starts (0 if manual epochs)

isMarketOpen(bytes32).details: Market is open if it exists and resolution time hasn't passed (or is 0 for manual)

returns._0: True if market is open for betting

isMarketReadyForResolution(bytes32).details: Market is ready for resolution if resolution time has passed (or is manual)

returns._0: True if market can be resolved

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setMarketController(address).details: Only callable by contract owner, establishes access control

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateResolutionTime(bytes32,uint256).details: Only MarketController can update resolution time

params._resolutionTime: New resolution timestamp (0 for manual resolution)

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

advanceEpoch(bytes32).notice: Advances market to next epoch (manual mode only)

createMarket(bytes32,uint256,uint256,uin.notice: Creates new market with specified outcomes and resolution time

getConditionId(address,bytes32,uint256,u.notice: Generates condition ID for market and epoch

getCurrentEpoch(bytes32).notice: Gets current epoch for market (time-based or manual)

getEpochEndTime(bytes32,uint256).notice: Gets the timestamp when a specific epoch ends

getEpochStartTime(bytes32,uint256).notice: Gets the timestamp when a specific epoch starts

getOutcomeCount(bytes32).notice: Gets number of possible outcomes for market

isMarketOpen(bytes32).notice: Checks if market is currently open for betting

isMarketReadyForResolution(bytes32).notice: Checks if market is ready for resolution

updateResolutionTime(bytes32,uint256).notice: Updates resolution time for existing market
